title: Malaysian English Words
description: Explore Manglish - the unique blend of English spoken in Malaysia!

questions.question: In Malaysian English, what does 'tapau' (or 'ta pau') mean?
options: To take away or pack food for takeout

questions.question: What does the particle 'lah' do in Malaysian English?
options: Adds emphasis, softens tone, or shows friendliness

questions.question: In Malaysia, what does 'mamak' refer to?
options: An Indian-Muslim restaurant or food stall

questions.question: What does 'potong stim' mean in Malaysian English?
options: To kill the mood or be a buzzkill

questions.question: In Malaysian English, what does 'gostan' mean?
options: To reverse or go backwards (from 'go astern')

questions.question: What does 'kacau' mean in Malaysian English?
What does 'cincai' mean in Malaysian English?
In Malaysian English, what does 'bo jio' mean?
What is a 'kopitiam' in Malaysian English?
In Malaysian English, what does 'jalan-jalan' mean?
options: To stroll, go for a walk, or go on an outing

questions.question: What does 'teruk' mean in Malaysian English?
In Malaysia, what does 'so how?' mean at the end of a discussion?
options: So what's the decision? / What shall we do?

questions.question: What does 'syok' (or 'shiok') mean in Malaysian English?
In Malaysian English, what does 'can or not?' mean?
options: Is it possible? / Can you do it?
